text.0: like atri viśvasāman sing to him of purifying light.
text.1: who must be praised in holy rites the priest most welcome in the house.
text.2: set jātavedas in his place agni the god and minister.
text.3: let sacrifice proceed today duly comprising all the gods.
text.4: all mortals come to thee for aid the god of most observant mind.
text.5: of thine excelling favour we bethink us as we long for it.
text.6: mark with attention this our speech o agni thou victorious one.
text.7: thee strongjawed as the homesteads lord the atris with their lauds exalt the atris beautify with songs.
